name: Stack Block - Tap Tower
description:
Welcome to Stack Block Tap Tower, “The best block game on mobiles.”
Tap tower stack-Up - reach up high in the sky, play this endless blocks stacking game
This is a super fun and highly addictive game suited for everyone.No Special Skills needed regardless of attentive mind and fast fingers!
Beat your friends, Discover all impossible stacks,unlock new stack.
Brain teaser Math & Logic Tower Puzzle
Who will stack higher? But can you build it, the highest skyscraper of this construction city?

DEVELOPER INFO: Stack Block is the leading developer in truly cross-platform social gaming! Chart-topping hits include Soccer Shoot Star, Panda bubble shoot christmas, Crazy Color Switch, Match Delicious Fruit Christmas, Bottle Flip, and so many more! Check out our other free match 3 puzzle games! You'll love to swap, match, and crunch through ever expanding levels and events. Check back often to see all the new candy, cake, and sweet treats that we've added! You'll love to crush through each sweet puzzle. Begin your adventure on one of our free match three puzzle games today!
